mission: Eliminate unknown type and error handling errors

summary: Successfully eliminated all targeted unknown type and any type errors in Wave 4. Fixed proper error handling patterns with appropriate type guards. All implicit any parameters now have explicit type annotations, and unsafe type assertions have been replaced with proper type guards and narrowing.
key_improvements: Eliminated all any types and replaced with unknown or proper types
Fixed error handling with proper instanceof Error checks
Added explicit type annotations to all function parameters
Replaced unsafe type assertions with type-safe alternatives
Improved type safety across the codebase
